title: Windows Vista Ultimate SP2 x64 en-US Oct01 2013
description:
Windows Vista Ultimate SP2 x64 en-US Oct01 2013

If you are curious if vista is crap, go ahead and try it out.

A original image from Microsoft that are updated
No Windows Vista Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.


Release Date:  2013-10-01
Release File:
Vista-U-SP2-x64-en-US-2013.iso
Size: 4.56 GB
CRC32: 74B87FE3
MD5: 3F0CCA0BE74192361AC19A9F5E010975
SHA-1: 9F0865E24DFE51FD4C0CE086948645F0F7B2F6A9

Language: en-US (English - United States)



This iso dont included:


* Browser Choice Screen Update KB976002 
  (Some people dosent want it and only want to uninstall it)

* Internet Explorer 9 
  (Almost all use another browser and only use internet explorer to 
  download a other browser,so it is IE that is available with vista with all updates in this iso.)

* Malicious Software Removal Tool KB890830 
  (You don't really need it since it's fairly useless, and is updated every month)

* Definition Update for Windows Defender KB915597 
  (Same above)



INSTALL NOTES 

1. Burn with imgburn or use a USB flash drive and tool like "Windows 7 USB/DVD tool". 
                   
2. Install using your own key or 
   use some of the Activates/patch out there.

3. Have fun =) 
  


I make this release so peoble can repurpose an old system that can't run the latest, or for anyone to use for the purposes of learning and 
experimentation.

And believe it or not but Vista perform better in performance then w7.

I make them for people who like to have 
updated versions of windows for when they install/re-install.

A lot of malware can be blocked by simply updating your system. 
Some malware goes undetected and goes to town on your system if you don't update your files.

And because not everyone has fast internet like me, i have very slow.

"If anyone is willing to donate $ or parts please PM me." 

                                                                              
Enjoy!
